subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Some N.F.L. teams, like the Bengals, have attempted to wrest their cases back from California to their own states, where many claims would be worth less or inviable.
snippet: Some N.F.L. teams, like the Bengals, have attempted to wrest their cases back from California to their own states, where many claims would be worth less or inviable.
